The Whelan lab

  • The Whelan lab
  • fiona.whelan-at-nottingham.ac.uk
  • fwhelan
  • whelanfj

The Whelan lab is a research group at the University of Nottingham studying the human microbiome and microbial pangenomes using bioinformatics and microbiology.
